page.title: 03Events - Fairfax Tomb
page.content: The Repair of the Fairfax Tomb. A notable event this year has been the repair of the tomb of Sir Thomas Fairfax, the Parliamentary Commander in the Civil War.Black Tom fought with Cromwell against the King at the Battle of Marston Moor,when the Royalists were defeated, but later he helped to restore the Monarchy after the death of Cromwell. His tomb in Bilbrough church had crumbled and deteriorated over the years, and there was no government grant to help to pay for the repair.Lots of donations have been received, and there have been many functions to raise money. Masons came from York Minster to do the work.
